translation.REGISTER_SUGGESTION: Don't have an account? Click the following link to register:
translation.HERE_ARE_POLLS: Select a poll to view its results and vote on it.
translation.SELECT_A_CHOICE: Select a choice and click vote to vote on it.
translation.S_ALREADY_VOTED: You have already voted on this poll and may not vote on it again.
